name: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc.
description: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in investing in and managing a diversified portfolio of mortgage-backed securities (MBS) and mortgage loans. Founded in 2008, the company operates with a commitment to generating attractive risk-adjusted returns for its shareholders. Invesco Mortgage Capital primarily invests in agency and non-agency MBS, as well as residential and commercial mortgage loans. The company leverages its deep expertise in the mortgage market to navigate complex market dynamics and seek opportunities across various interest rate environments. With a focus on prudent risk management and a disciplined investment approach, Invesco Mortgage Capital aims to maximize income and capital appreciation. The company is a subsidiary of Invesco Ltd., a global investment management firm, which provides it with a robust infrastructure and access to a wide range of investment strategies. As part of its commitment to transparency, Invesco Mortgage Capital regularly communicates its financial performance and investment strategies to its stakeholders.
